name: Some nights with Owen
description:
More mechanics and updates each night.

made on scratch (( Chad Added ) Some Nights With Owens / Night 1 on Scratch (mit.edu) )

each night is a seperate file

based off fnaf ofc

_______________________

Story :

Chad, Owens adoptive brother was really into FNAF, that he decided to make his own animatronics. in the middle of the night, each one would kill the person they were based off of. after the incident, Glitcher Guy decided to make them a restaurant named Owen's Italian and Fries!
